actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat as public charities certain organizations which operate libraries.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to treat a library established by State or Federal law as a charitable institution for purposes of the charitable income tax deduction.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat as public charities certain organizations which operate libraries.
